Let the photoshopping begin :)

08 Jan 2006 There was a discussion on the pulltheplug chat today about how sucky the security of Rosiello products is. One thing let to the other and some links to pictures were pasted.

Then, a first (to my knowledge) PTP Photoshop contest was launched, and I entered this picture:


[img_assist|fid=1017698|thumb=1|alt=6110_large.jpg]

While I was editing this blog, I noticed an error in the changes I made to the img_assist module. It would not show all the pictures I wanted. I'm gonna look into it more closely and submit the changes to the drupal.org site again.
